div.bibl: The Reform Advocate, Vol. 32, Wk. of Oct. 13, 1906, P. 246

body.p: A dinner will be given at the Standard Club next Tuesday evening for the purpose of forming a Young Men's Auxiliary to the Associated Jewish Charities. The object of the new organization will be to secure the names of all young men who are not contributors to A. J. C.,and induce them to aid in the vast work which is being done for charity in this city.
